meanings.definition: A stretch of land, especially with regard to its physical features.
meanings.sent1: The hikers explored the rugged terrains of the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The desert terrains are vast and barren.
meanings.sent3: The terrains seemed to play hide and seek with the adventurers.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like unpredictable terrains, full of highs and lows.
meanings.sent5: The terrains of the forest whispered ancient stories to those who listened.

meanings.definition: An area or region; a field of knowledge or activity.
meanings.sent1: The culinary terrains of the city offer a variety of flavors.
meanings.sent2: She navigated the unfamiliar terrains of academia with determination.
meanings.sent3: Exploring the terrains of fashion, she found her unique style.
meanings.sent4: In the terrains of technology, he was a pioneer.
meanings.sent5: The terrains of literature are vast and full of hidden treasures.
